Package org.talend.designer.core.ui

Class Summary
CodeEditorInput DOC nrousseau class global comment.
CodeStorage Storage that will store a text in memory.
MultiPageEditorContributor Manages the installation/deinstallation of global actions for multi-page editors.
MultiPageTalendEditor This class is the main editor, the differents pages in it are:
1) TalendEditor
2) Editor on the generated code

This class uses the interface ISelectionListener, it allows to propage the Delete evenement to the designer.
MultiPageTalendSelectionProvider Extension of the standard MultiPageSelectionProvider.
TalendCreationWizard Create a new file for Talend on the workspace.
